titleStmt.title: Flandreau Cemetery, (Chester Place, New Rochelle, New York, USA)

availability.p: Copyright © 2001, Christopher Alan Mosher, Shelton, Connecticut, USA.
availability.licence: This work is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0 International License.

sourceDesc.bibl: Flandreau Cemetery, (Chester Place, New Rochelle, New York, USA); personally read, photographed, and fully transcribed all gravestones in 2001.

correction.p: Rough transcription in person, later verified and corrected from photograph.

normalization.p: Only minor normalization where needed, if any, is indicated via markup.

punctuation.p: All punctuation marks in the source text have been retained, and are represented by appropriate Unicode code points.
Punctuation may be marked up with pc elements for clarification, but not exclusively.

quotation.p: All quotation marks have been retained, and are represented by appropriate Unicode code points.

hyphenation.p: Hyphenated words that appear at the end of a line have been retained. The hyphen, if present, is represented by the Unicode code point, and marked up with a pc element. The break="no" attribute on the lb element indicates that a single word is split across the lines.

interpretation.p: Dates, places, and names may be marked up, where useful.

body.p:
This is a list of people burried at the cemetery, based on several different sources,
including a DAR-compiled list, Florence Bennett, Mr. Spies,
Peter Gunn, and Christopher A. Mosher.
body.ab:
Benjamin Flandreau (1718-09-04–1800-02-19)
In
Memory of
BENJAMIN FLANDRAU,
who departed this life
Febry. 19th, 1800
Aged 81 Years 5 months
and 15 days.
Exult my Soul with Joys that flow
From GOD,s Almighty hand.
Whilst here my m[oulding body] lies
To rise at his command.
Benjamin Flandreau (1803-10-13–1805-08-20)
In
[m]emory of
[BENJA]MIN FLANDRAU
[who dep]arted this life
[Aug 27]th 1807 aged 45
[years 2 mont]hs & 10 days.
[Also of his] son
[BENJAM]IN,
[who departed th]is life
[Aug 20th 1805 age]d 1
[year 10 months & 7 da]ys
Joseph Mullineaux (1724-09-15–1807-10-28)
IN
Memory of
Joseph Mullinex
WHoo Departed This
Life october the 28 day
1807 AGeb 83 years
1 month 13 days.
Sarah Ester Russel (1815-??-??–1829-10-16)
SARAH ESTHER,
daughter of Laban
& Sarah Russel,
departed this life
Oct. 16. 1829,
in her 15. year.
---------
Ah: lovely appearance of death,
What sight upon earth is so fair.
Magdelene Seacord [née Flandreau] (1759-09-29–1840-01-30)
In
memory of
MAGDALEN,
wife of
Daniel Seacord,
who died
Jan. 30, 1840,
aged 80 y'rs 4 mo,
& 1 day.
James A. Seacord (1837-05-13–1842-10-13)
IN
memory of
JAMES. A.
son of
Leonard & Maria
Seacord.
who died
Oct. 13, 1842.
aged 5 Years and
5 Mos.
----
Benjamin Flandreau (1810-02-22–1844-11-21)
IN
memory of
Benjamin Flandreau
Born Feb. 22, 1810.
Died Nov. 21, 1844.
----
Affliction sore long time I bore
Phycians were in vain
Till God alone did hear my moan
And eased me of my pain.
[unknown]
[???]
[???I suffer out my threescore years???]
[???Till my de]liverer co[me]
[???And wipe awa]y his servant's [tears]
[???And take his] exile home.
The following stones could no longer be found, as of 2001.
Benjamin Flandreau (1762-06-17–1807-08-27)
John Flandreau (1771-04-02–1809-01-27)
Esther Flandreau [née Badeau] (1730-??-??–1811-05-08)
Amelia Flandreau (1811-??-??–1811-08-08)
Phoebe (1794-??-??–1812-02-11)
John Badeau (1741-??-??–1815-12-11)
Susan Badeau (1750-??-??–1817-12-08)
Elizabeth Flandreau (1771-??-??–1822-08-15)
Esther Stillwell [née Flandreau] (1757-??-??–1832-04-26)
Ann Eliza Flandreau (1810-12-09–1835-03-04)
Benjamin Badeau Flandreau (1835-02-13–1835-03-25)
John W. Seacord (1797-05-28–1838-07-10)
Daniel Seacord (1759-03-13–1843-06-13)
Catherine Irene Flandreau (1805-09-15–1845-10-08)
Elisha Harsen (1841-04-05–1864-08-05)
Theodore Flandreau (1844-07-05–1866-11-21)
Susan Flandreau (1800-08-24–1868-11-05)
Isabella Flandreau (1810-??-??–1892-11-19)
